title: Color synesthesia
content:
I'd be interested in hearing from typophiles, especially type designers, who are color synesthetes. How does your synesthesia influence your work? your art? your life?

[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grapheme-color\_synesthesia](http://web.archive.org/web/20100329013829/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grapheme-color_synesthesia "http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grapheme-color\_synesthesia")
